translations: 松柏类，针叶树；球果植物（conifer 复数）

sentences.sentence: In western North America, most have been replaced by monocultures of fast-growing conifers.
sentences.translation: 在北美西部，大多数农业活动已被速生针叶树的单一栽培所取代。

sentences.sentence: For many trees—evergreen conifers being an exception—the best strategy is to abandon photosynthesis until the spring.
sentences.translation: 对于许多树木来说——常绿的针叶树是一个例外——最好的策略是在春天之前放弃光合作用。

sentences.sentence: Insects and even small invertebrates have been found preserved in the hardened resins of conifers and certain other trees.
sentences.translation: 人们在针叶树和某些其它树木的硬化树脂中发现了昆虫，甚至发现了小型无脊椎动物。
